title: Cleansing Oil
description: When you have a damaged barrier If the skin barrier is damaged, the skin becomes very vulnerable. Reacts to many products until 100% correct. If you start using cleansing oil at this time, many times the product may not suit or may not be suitable for the skin. If the skin is damaged, as a micellar water for double cleansing, there are options like Bifesta micellar water, biore micellar water, daiso micellar water which are quite gentle. and non-irritating.
